headline: FedEx Announces Commencement of Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for Senior Notes
summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn., January 07, 2025--FedEx Corp. (NYSE: FDX) ("FedEx") announced today the commencement of offers to exchange any and all of its outstanding senior notes of the series listed in the table below (the "Existing Notes") for new notes to be issued by FedEx (the "New Notes"). As previously disclosed, FedEx has announced that its Board of Directors has decided to pursue a full separation of its FedEx Freight business through the capital markets, creating a new publicly traded company. The

headline: Winter Storm Blair: FedEx, UPS and US Postal Service warn of delays
summary: Delivery services across the central and eastern U.S. have been stymied by the severe weather.
